name: Promotion Class: Archer
description:
Role: Ranged Damage

A master of bows who can shoot whilst on the move and excels at bringing down enemies from afar.

Stat Adjustments:
Ranged Distance +21m
Ranged Distance Cap +21m
Weapon Damage +9
Power Damage Bonus: Ranged +9

Traits Granted:
Recurve Bow Mastery
High Tension Compound Bow Mastery
Spellbound Longbow Mastery
Quiver Proficiency
Exotic Arrows Proficiency

Enhancements:
Rapid Fire: Now shoots up to 10 arrows.  Gain a Critical Strike buff for each non-critical hit.
Concussive Trap: Now reduces target's Physical Mitigations.
Disengage: Now resets the cooldown of Rapid Fire.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Archer promotion class and prevents access to the Warden and Brigand promotion classes.
